descriptions:
Hello, I tell you about our special product for Christmas time. We make nice Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths for decorate home. This set have 5 pieces for make place beautiful.

In set, you get one lighted wreath, two garlands with lights, two red bows, and one metal hanger. We use good materials like PE synthetic fir for the wreath and warm yellow LED for lights. All light things work with battery so no need wires.

Size of garland is long 106 and round part is 10. It has 315 branch tips for look full. The round wreath is big 17.72 across. Red bows are big too, they are 23.6 long and 13.8 wide.

We put nice things on wreath like pine cones and red berries. Garland shines with LED lights and bows are red color for Christmas feeling.

You can use for many places like front door, fireplace, Christmas tree, mantel, porch, cabinets, and shelves. It make all these places look for Christmas.

We hope you like this set and make your holiday special with Yingzhao Christmas Wreaths. Thank you for look at our product.

Hello, please let me present to you our Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths. This set is very special for Christmas time. It is including many items for decorating your place. We send you one lighted wreath, two pieces of garlands with beautiful lights, two big red bows, and one metal hanger for easy putting on walls or doors.

The wreath is made from PE synthetic fir, looking like real tree but lasting long time. Lights on wreath and garlands are warm yellow LED, giving cozy feeling. They are using batteries to work, so no need for plugs.

Sizes of items are good for fitting in different places. Garland is long 106 units and diameter is 10 units, having 315 branch tips to look full and pretty. The wreath is round shape with 17.72 units across. Bows are big and noticeable, width is 23.6 units and height is 13.8 units.

We use nice decor elements like pine cones and red berries on wreath, and garlands have their own lights. Bows are bright red color to catch eyes. You can use this set in many places like front door to welcome guests, fireplace to make warm scene, or Christmas tree for traditional decoration. Also good for mantel, porch, cabinets, and shelves. It will look nice in homes, shops, hotels, living rooms, and at Christmas parties.

This set is made for Christmas but you can use it for making happy atmosphere in any place you want to have holiday spirit. We hope you enjoy our Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths. Thank you for considering our product for your festive decoration needs.
